++ Object Data Information Computer Program Bootloader

+++ SUMMARY

ObjectDataInformationComputerProgram

  * Loads computer operating system or stand-alone utility to be executed by CPU
    * When a computer powers on the CPU has no program to execute in memory. 
  
  * can also load a storage dump program for diagnosing problems in an operating system. 



+++ SYNONYMS
  * ObjectDataInformationComputerProgramBootManager
  * ObjectDataInformationComputerProgramBootstrapLoader

+++ PARENT

ObjectDataInformationComputerProgram
